1.content:
Misty nervously stood outside of the mahogany door of a mini mansion, the porch light illuminating her jean jacket amidst the darkness. Misty reached over to the doorbell, but then stopped herself short. She rarely went to social events and didn't know her neighbors particularly well. They weren't her typical crowd. In fact, she was lucky that she lived in such a nice neighborhood at all. Had it not been for her roommate striking it rich after college she would be living in some mouse infested hovel. She reached up again, but before the tip of her finger could reach the button, the door swung open.
"Misty, since to see you!", an attractive Persian woman bellowed, using her free hand hug Misty while held back her wine drinking arm. Misty got a whiff of expensive perfume as she hugged back. "Thanks for having me, Roxana", she replied meekly.
"Come, come, we've been waiting for you", with that, Roxana disengaged and led Misty into the living room. The home had low lighting, with middle eastern paintings and decor covering the walls. What got Misty attention was the presence of five other women. Laura Seitz seemed to be lecturing her daughter, Ashley, by wine, most likely because she had tried to drink some. Jackie Sparks and Izzy Montoya were hotly debating politics over drinks, while Monica Yi was off to the side, her face burried in her phone. Misty knew all the attendees, but not particularly well.
" Ladies, our final guest has arrived", Roxana announced, showcasing Misty before making her way to the center of the room, by a rustic looking table that seemed to have inscriptions on it. "The reason why I invited you here tonight was to get to know each of you better. However, I didn't expect to accomplish that in one night. Especially in this day and age, people exist as facades, often not even knowing themselves. In fact, the only true way to know another is to experience the world as they do. That is why I would like to invite you all to the Nightly Swap Club."
A quizzical look appeared on Jackie's face, "As in walk a mile in each other's shoes?".
"Exactly", Roxana smiled,"Today is Sunday, meaning that we have a full week ahead of us. Each night, at the stroke of midnight, you will switch into the body of the next member of the group until you have been each of them at least once."
"You're actually trying to get us to join a Freaky Friday Club?", Ashley questioned,"That sounds crazy".
Roxana shrugged, "Indulge me then. If you agree and wake up in your own body tomorrow, I'll pay for a spa day for each of you. However, I must warn you, the only way to swap into the next body is to orgasm in your previous vessel".
A grin appeared on Monica's face,"Now you've got my attention. I'm in."
"Excellent", Roxana replied, "Please place your hand on the table, please".
"This is ridiculous", Izzy remarked, but then stopped, touching her swollen belly,"I would like a break from this, though. What do I have to lose?" She proceeded to follow Monica's lead and placed her hand on the table.
"Having sex in other people's bodies?", Laura asked, a bit disgusted. Ashley, however, took pleasure in that face, "Come on, Mom!", she chided with fake enthusiasm, dragging her mother and placing both their palms on the altar.
Jackie casually walked up, mirroring them, "I could always use a spa day".
Roxana looked over to Misty,"Well?", she asked.
She didn't know why, but there was a strange feeling of excitement welling up inside of her. With a look of curiosity, Misty joined the Swap Club and set her hand with their's. Suddenly, each woman felt an overwhelming pulling feeling and Misty could swear that the table was glowing. Roxana looked upon all of them jovially, "The Nightly Swap Club has begun. Go get some rest, ladies. In the morning you'll feel like a whole new woman".
The members exchanged awkward farewells and departed swiftly. As she tucked herself in, Misty wondered if she would actually wake up as someone else, but she was overcome with drowsiness and succumbed to slumber.

In the morning, she woke up as...
1.title: The Nightly Swap Club

11.content:

It looked like an archaeologist's study, containing various sculptures, relics and foreign memorabilia. She finally discovered the bathroom, which had stained glass windows and was well lit. Mist squinted a the note before she was interrupted by a ring at the door," Oh shit", she remarked, making her way to the mahogany door. Behind the door was...

info.brief_description: The women of a neighborhood spend each night as each other
info.description:
This story is based on a series of captions of the same name by Tehswitcher.

The women of Exchange Estates are about to get a much better understanding of each other thanks to a new resident. For one week, each night at midnight, the participants of the Nightly Swap Club will change bodies to another member. In order to swap, they must have reached an orgasm in the body they were inhabiting before midnight. Each member must spend at least one day as every other participant before they can return to their original body.

Rules

1. At least three sentences per chapter unless it is a choice chapter.
2. No sexual acts that are illegal in the US are permitted in this story ie pedophilia, beastiality, rape, etc
3. New characters may be added
4. Get creative!

Characters


Roxana Sasanid: A new resident of Exchange Estates and the organizer of the Nightly Swap Club. She is in her mid-thirties, with olive skin and long, thick black hair. She has thin eyebrows and a hawk-like nose. She is a woman of fine tastes who carries an aura of mystery about her.

Misty Evans: A 25 year old introvert, Misty was a liberal arts major who instantly regretted that decision after graduation. She is thin, with a rather pale complection and long, Brown hair. She is very intelligent but is quite shy and introverted.

Laura Seitz: The biggest gossiper of the neighborhood, Laura is the 45 year old mother of two college students. She is 5'4, and has accumulated an ample amount of cushion over the years. She has shoulder length blonde hair and very large breasts.

Ashley Seitz: Laura's 19 year old daughter, Ashley is home from college on Summer Break. She is 5'9, with dirty blonde hair that is normally in a ponytail. Although she didn't inherit her mother's chest, her butt and tighes are thick thanks to college volleyball

Isabella "Izzy" Montoya: Age 30, Isabella is pregnant and preparing to become a first time mother. She is 5'0, with tan skin and silky black hair. Her belly is quite swollen and is expecting in two weeks. She is quite feisty, and enjoys a good argument.

Jackie Sparks: Izzy's argumentative sparring partner, Jackie is a lawyer with a quick wit. She is black, 32 Years old, 5'8 and has a naturally curvy body. Her hair is elaborately braided, and she normally wears pantsuits. She is a recent divorcee and excited to be back on the market.

Monica Yi: A free spirit, Monica opened a very successful tattoo studio. Monica is Asian, 24 Year's old and 5'4, with short black hair and numerous tattoos on her body. She has a live in girlfriend and regularly uses cannabis products.
